price: 不然！我的许多迹象，确已来临你，但都被你否认了，你妄自尊大，你变成不归信的。
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتِي فَكَذَّبۡتَ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: balā qad jāatka āyātī fakadhabta bihā wa-is'takbarta wakunta mina al-kāfirīna
